definition: scissors/shears/clippers/CL:把[ba3]/to cut with scissors/to trim/to wipe out or exterminate
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: After she ceased to be a girlfriend, K. decided never to have her hair cut again.
sentences.chinese: 分手後，K決定再也不剪頭髮了。

sentences.english: that you can get a haircut at if you really need haircut.
sentences.chinese: 如果你需要剪頭髮的話，就可以去那裏。

sentences.english: I got my hair cut yesterday. I've never had it this short.
sentences.chinese: 我昨天剪頭髮了，我頭髮從來沒有剪過這麼短。

sentences.english: Great to clip those coupons and give haircuts , too.
sentences.chinese: 用來剪取贈券，剪頭髮也是很好的。

sentences.english: Consider getting your hair cut at the barber.
sentences.chinese: 想象一下在理髮店剪頭髮。

sentences.english: You need a haircut at a beauty shop.
sentences.chinese: 你需要去理髮室剪頭髮。

sentences.english: He didn't cut his hair nor wear the right kind of clothes.

sentences.chinese: 早上好，琳達。你剪頭髮了？
每次給小孩子剪頭髮都是一次緊張的經驗。

sentences.english: I'm the only one who can get my haircut.
sentences.chinese: 只有我能經歷我剪頭髮一事。

sentences.english: Of course,it's not just special about haircuts.
sentences.chinese: 當然，不僅是剪頭髮是這樣。

sentences.english: Does Yuan Jiang City cut best barber's shop of hair?
sentences.chinese: 沅江剪頭髮最好的理髮店？

sentences.english: He asked me if I wanted a haircut.
sentences.chinese: 當他問我是否也想要剪頭髮時，我拒絕了。

sentences.english: Nobody can get my haircut for me.

sentences.chinese: 早上好，琳達。你剪頭髮了？

definition: to wash one's hair/to have a shampoo
to scald/to burn (by scalding)/to blanch (cooking)/to heat (sth) up in hot water/to perm/to iron/scalding hot
Mawei district of Fuzhou city 福州市[Fu2 zhou1 shi4], Fujian
ponytail (hairstyle)/horse's tail/slender fibers like horse's tail (applies to various plants)
